name: Overdue Worlds
description:
Made for the "overdue library books" Bitsy jam: https://itch.io/jam/overdue-library-books-bitsy

Your Uncle needs you to return some overdue books for him. Problem is, these books transport people to other worlds and they're so overdue that they've become overgrown or broken in some way. You'll have to go in and fix them up before returning them.

Inspired by Myst and various games where you clean up a level and make it look nice.

There are some minor glitches I couldn't get rid of that shouldn't be a problem.

If there are game breaking glitches, please let me know.
